page_content:
Tackling sustainability issues and enabling our planet,  
its people, and all living things to continue to thrive is a design challenge, perhaps the most pressing one in history. Helping our customers imagine, design, and create a better world is one of the most important strategic opportunities for Autodesk in the coming decades. Sustainability in ActionSummary Sketch FY2012 
February 2011 – January 2012
